required.name: Andorra
required.note: Schengen visa covers entry.

required.name: The Bahamas
required.note: Visa is not required for those holding a US Permanent Resident card

required.name: Belize
required.note: visa on arrival for those holding a valid US visa

required.name: Bhutan
required.note: e-visa available

required.name: Canada
required.note: Visa is not required for those holding a US Permanent Resident card

required.name: China
required.note: 72-hours visa free visit when in transit at Beijing, Chengdu, Chongqing, Dalian, Guangzhou, Guilin, Shanghai, Shenyang and Xi'an. 6 days visa-free if arriving from Hong Kong or Macao to Guangdong province; and at / from Dongguan, Guangzhou, Huizhou, Shantou, Shenzhen or Zhuhai.

required.name: Colombia
required.note: e-visa available

required.name: Costa Rica
required.note: visa is not required for those holding a valid visa for the US, EU States, Japan or Canada

required.name: Cuba
required.note: No visa required, tourist card prior to arrival for a max. stay of 30 days

required.name: Cyprus
required.note: Pro-visa for single stays of 90 days is available over the Internet.

required.name: Eritrea
required.note: Pre-approved visa on arrival is available.

required.name: Ethiopia
required.note: visa on arrival is available for individuals holding a letter of invitation

required.name: The Gambia
required.note: tourist visa on arrival for those traveling on a charter flight

required.name: Ghana
required.note: pre-arranged visa on arrival

required.name: Guyana
required.note: -e-visa is available

required.name: Republic of Ireland
required.note: Visa waiver for UK 'C' visa holders until October 2016. Entry permitted only if first point of entry to the Common Travel Area is in the UK.

required.name: South Korea
required.note: Visa not required for 30 days for Jeju Island.

required.name: Nigeria
required.note: Pre-approved visa on arrival is available.

required.name: Pakistan
required.note: Visa on arrival when travelling on business valid for 30 days. Conditions apply.

required.name: Qatar
required.note: E-visa is available.

required.name: Singapore
required.note: E-visa option available. Some provisions for 96 hours visa-free transit.

required.name: Solomon Islands
required.note: pre-arranged visa on arrival available

required.name: Suriname
required.note: pre-arranged visa on arrival is available for max. stays of 2 months

required.name: Trinidad and Tobago
required.note: -e-visa is available

required.name: Tunisia
required.note: Not required for tours organised by a travel agency.

required.name: United Arab Emirates
required.note: e-visa is available

required.name: Vietnam
required.note: e-visa is available

not-required.name: Belarus
not-required.note: The internal passport is accepted for border crossing. 90 days within a 180-day period

not-required.name: Dominican Republic
not-required.note: 90 days (10 USD Tourist Card valid for 30 days must be purchased upon arrival)

not-required.name: Kazakhstan
not-required.note: 90 days, use of internal passport allowed

not-required.name: Kyrgyzstan
not-required.note: 90 days, use of internal passport allowed

not-required.name: Mexico
not-required.note: Electronic Authorization (SAE - Solicitud de Autorización Electrónica) required.

not-required.name: Mongolia
not-required.note: 90 days; provided holding an official or private invitation.

not-required.name: Russia
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days. Use of internal passport allowed as of April 2016.

not-required.name: Tajikistan
not-required.note: 3 months, use of internal passport allowed

evisa.name: Ivory Coast
evisa.note: 3 months; eVisa holders must arrive via Port Bouet Airport.

evisa.name: Gabon
evisa.note: Electronic visa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.

evisa.name: Kenya
evisa.note: 3 months; visa on arrival until 1 September 2015

on-arrival.name: Iran
on-arrival.note: 30 days Can be extended for additional 15 days.

on-arrival.name: Lebanon
on-arrival.note: 1 month extendable for 2 additional months; granted free of charge at Beirut International Airport or any other port of entry if there is no Israeli visa or seal, holding a telephone number, an address in Lebanon, and a non refundable return or circle trip ticket.

on-arrival.name: Somalia
on-arrival.note:
30 days, provided an invitation letter issued by the sponsor has been submitted
to the Airport Immigration Department at least 2 days before arrival.

unknown.name: Syria
unknown.note: According to the IATA database, visa may be obtained on arrival and is valid for 15 days. According to the media, Syria passed a new law that requires all foreign citizens to obtain a visa in advance.
